title: I purchased a mystery skin and then got gifted the skin a day later?
body:
So I bought a mystery skin last night and got dark star thresh; I was pretty happy with the result.

Then I logged in tonight and I got a gift from riot games for "good behavior" or something (i don't remember the exact wording) and..... it was dark star thresh. Is this just how mystery skins work now? Or did I get a gift of the same thing I effectively bought via mystery skin?

replies.body: Most likely that "good behavior" gift was either the key fragment or Honor capsule you got. Riot doesn't send out skins for free for anything like that.
